revised_title: Simpler Form of the Whitehead-Rayner Expanding Universe
tldr: The author presents a simpler derivation of the fundamental form of an expanding universe based on Whitehead's gravitational theory. By considering a distribution of matter in flat space-time, the author obtains an equivalent form of Rayner's model through straightforward calculations. The resulting Whitehead-Rayner universe model accounts for gravity and is invariant under Lorentz transformations.
